title: Add 'open app in marketplace' in the app menu (rate
body: Add 'open app in marketplace' in the app menu (rate & review, uninstall, pin to start)

comments.body: Either that or call Azure, Office & Visual Studio marketplaces as store too, for consistent naming. Besides Windows Marketplace should imply the new volume licensing based Windows Store for Business whereas the Windows Store implies direct to consumer, so the marketing offers on both need to be separated by publishers. And publishers should choose store when they have app ready, rather than register separately like Visual Studio marketplace demands.
